website_summaries.verdict: A nice pair of swim trunks for boys that double as the perfect Fourth of July attire.
pros: Comes in sizes all the way from toddler up to big boy
The string in these trunks actually tightens the trunks rather than just being a decorative piece
cons: These trunks seem to run a little on the small side

customer_reviews.title: As American as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: Quality bathing suit. If you want you child to look like a true American then this is the suit for you. When I unpacked it I think I heard the cry of a bald eagle. The Stars and Stripes are so clear that they may as well have been stitched by Betsy Ross herself. As my son walked along the edge of the pool on the 4th of July men stopped to salute, women applauded, and the Star Spangled Banner (as played by Jimmy Hendrix at Woodstock) played from an unknown location.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Fun, festive, comfortable trunks
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these, particularly because he can match his dad. They have a functioning drawstring, which is clutch for my skinny guy. They also have pockets, which my son likes
customer_reviews.author: Christianna R.

customer_reviews.title: True to size and working drawstring!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son that is only a year and a half but wears 2T, they fit perfect so because it has a drawstring that actually works i exchanged for a size up so that we can possibly use next year. Haven’t used them yet so not sure how they will hold up but thick material, working drawstring and great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina&Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Inseam is rough
customer_reviews.text: The shorts look nice, the colors are bright. But the inseam thread is very rough and while at the beach my child was in major pain because of it. It caused a red rash and that burns when salt water touches it. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Donna M

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES these swim trunks and they look even better in person
customer_reviews.text: Go "merica! My son LOVES these swim trunks and they look even better in person. They are longer than the typical swim trunks but they do not interfere with swimming one bit. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: NOT EVEN CLOSE TO MEN'S SIZING
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shorts twice because I knew the first time I ordered I must have made a mistake. The men's small fits like a boy's small. Super disappointed that there is no link for me to return the two pairs of trunks I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT SWIM TRUNK
customer_reviews.text: Finally a swim trunk that fits now and can grow with my 8 yr old little boy. It has the inside netting which is a bonus. The draw string was a surprise because it does what its suppose to do, which allows me to customize the fit. I like the Captain American style because i can recognize my son from a distance. All in all, i am very happy with this product and would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: It is a great swim trunk but fits a somewhat smaller
customer_reviews.text: It is a great swim trunk but fits a somewhat smaller. I got size 8-10 for my 7 yr old son as he is on the bigger side. It does fit him well but he will outgrow soon. Got him another one size in 10-12. He loves them both as they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Uma Audi

customer_reviews.title: Well made, super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking, well made. Grandson looks super cute in them. I purchased them for his trip to Texas.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: more like a long shoelace
customer_reviews.text: These are cute but the drawstring is very long, more like a long shoelace. Having to untie the inside drawstring as well as the exterior drawstring when my toddler needs to use the restroom is annoying. I will not purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: He loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I like almost everything about these swim trunks except that the pockets come out when swimming and he kept trying to poke them back in, which was troublesome, but other than that, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Howard

customer_reviews.title: Fit nice
customer_reviews.text: Fit well for my son. Nice quality have lasted a long time. Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Son loves these swim shorts. Wears them all the time they are his favorite pair. My kids are on the slender side and these fit pretty well we have to tie them.
customer_reviews.author: gma

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and hit BUY NOW
customer_reviews.text: How stinking cute are these? I just absolutely love these little American flag swim trunks. Quality is great! Stylish bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson to wear for our Labor Day cookout. They fit him perfectly (size 8) and he looked great in them.
customer_reviews.author: ValerieC

customer_reviews.title: Great shorts
customer_reviews.text: Super cute patriotic shorts for our little man. I ordered the 2t, which is the size he wears, and they fit him perfectly. They are good quality swim shorts, not see through or thin. We are very happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: SourthernLady2011

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shorts! Had to return and order a size up. My son is a true size 10/12 and they were too small. Great material, very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son perfectly! They worked well all summer. He really felt comfortable and liked the design. #Merica

customer_reviews.title: Love these swim trunks!!
customer_reviews.text: Our 9 year old grandson loves these swim trunks! The sizing is perfect and the quality is extremely good. The waistband stays up and is comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Great swim trunks
customer_reviews.text: My son is very thin. He has to wear adjustable waist pants and shorts. The size we purchased was smaller than the size for his age, but was perfect for his smaller waist. It fit just right.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and looks just as pictured. Had to return because it was too small but my son is in between sizes. I’d still say to size up.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These shorts are so cute and perfect for our 18 month old! They wash well, too!

customer_reviews.title: Fits my son perfectly and they're adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are so cute! They fit exactly as expected, my son is 18 months old, he's really tall and skinny for his age and these fit him PERFECTLY. My son is 34.5 inches tall, 29.5 lbs, I ordered a 2T and they're perfect. Not a single issue with them. We have used them a handful of times, they definitely pass the toddler test!

customer_reviews.title: Boys Patriotic swim trunks
customer_reviews.text: Material is a little stiff but fit is as expected, the tie is real which is a bonus. The flag design is great.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality. My son wears 2t some smaller 3t and they fit him perfectly. I order 3t.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! 6
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! 6.5 year old son wore them and they fit great. Wore in a mud-run and after we washed them, they restored (even the white) to it's original color! Impressed.

customer_reviews.text: Cute swim trunks, but they run small in the waist so size up.

customer_reviews.title: USA, USA, USA
customer_reviews.text: LOVE These!!! I bought the adult size for my Husband and the kids size for my 5 year old son. Both fit great and look just like the pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Good choice.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome suit and the grandkid who got it for Chirstmas thought so too. It is made of quality fabric and well constructed. Besides, he looks really cute and hip in it.

customer_reviews.text: Love these trunks! Have bought a pair for my little guy 2 years in a row. Good quality with a drawstring that is actually functional and not just for looks!

customer_reviews.title: but I believe it would have been just fine to leave in there
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for both of my boys...one is 4T and the other is 7/8. Both trunks came in and fit perfectly! The netting is not rough, it isn't soft either. We opted to remove it, but I believe it would have been just fine to leave in there. Have had these over a year and they still look great!

customer_reviews.text: This was bought for a little boys birthday gift for the 2nd year in a row....and he loved it both years!!

The waist has a drawstring so that is awesome. It is a surf short length - down to the knees. Quality of material is really nice.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I, and more importantly my son, love these trunks! They're well made, great fit, and look adorable! And easy to spot across the pool, lol. I am very pleased with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute! Great Color!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2T for my lil' mans 1st birthday. So I think the product runs slightly small...AND my guy is on the bigger size. Either way the color and the quality are awesome! I just hope it stretches enough to get two summers wear out of it. Either way - it is definitely "hand-me-down" quality!

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!

product_meta.title: Kanu Surf Boys' American Flag Swim Trunk
product_meta.description: Kanu surf presents our newest swim trunks yet. Kanu, a surf and swim lifestyle brand, is well known for great prints and colors along with high quality functional apparel for the whole family. All of our trunks are made with our comfort technology quick dry fabric with a UPF 50+ rating. All trunks have 2 side pockets. Some have 1 or 2 cargo pockets as well for extra storage. Most trunks feature triple needle stitching for extra durability. These trunks are built to last. Our patriot trunk is a hip USA flag print with 2 side pockets and a cargo pocket. Mesh lining. Outside drawstring. Available in boys 2-20. Matching styles in adult sizes so dads and kids can hit the beach scene as a team. Check out the coordinating rash guard to make a great set
feature_bullets: 100 percent poly comfort technology quick dry microfiber with UPF 50+ rating
Available in men's and kids sizes infants through 20
